Trade/Device Name(s): AccuChek Instant Plus Dual Testing System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AccuChek Instant Plus Dual Testing System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AccuChek Instant Plus Dual Testing System measuring cholesterol and glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of cholesterol and glucose in capillary whole blood for home and professional use; glucose testing for home/professional settings, cholesterol testing for healthcare professionals and home use by people with diabetes
